TableView.name: VIEW_SMP5_EXPORTACAO_ANATEL
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
WITH dados_x_codigos AS
(SELECT c.DATA,
c.BILHETADOR_ORIGINAL,
c.CENTRAL AS msc,
c.CN,
c.PMM,
c.REGIONAL,
c.SMP5_A,
c.SMP5_B,
c.SMP5_C,
c.SMP5_D,
c.UF,
c.CODIGO
FROM VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5 c,
VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP5 v
WHERE v.CN = c.CN
AND v.MSC = c.CENTRAL
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(c.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = v.PERIODO
AND v.STATUS = 'T'
),
codigos_sem_dados AS
(SELECT DISTINCT codigo.MSC,
codigo.CN
FROM MSC_CN_CODIGO codigo,
(SELECT DISTINCT BILHETADOR.nome
FROM indicador,
TIPO_TECNOLOGIA,
TECNOLOGIA,
BILHETADOR
WHERE TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = indicador.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA
AND TIPO_TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA
AND TECNOLOGIA.ID = BILHETADOR.ID_TECNOLOGIA
AND indicador.nome IN ('SMP3', 'SMP4', 'SMP5', 'SMP7')
) bilhetador
WHERE codigo.MSC = bilhetador.nome
MINUS
SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.msc,
TO_CHAR(dados_x_codigos.CN)
FROM dados_x_codigos
),
distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm AS
(SELECT *
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(dados_x_codigos.DATA) AS data FROM dados_x_codigos
) datas,
(SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.msc,
TO_CHAR(dados_x_codigos.CN) cn
FROM dados_x_codigos
) msc,
(SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.PMM FROM dados_x_codigos
) pmm
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT data,
MSC,
TO_CHAR(CN) cn
FROM
(SELECT DISTINCT data,
codigos_sem_dados.MSC,
codigos_sem_dados.CN
FROM codigos_sem_dados,
(SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(dados_x_codigos.DATA) AS data FROM dados_x_codigos
)
)
) msc,
(SELECT DISTINCT dados_x_codigos.PMM FROM dados_x_codigos
) pmm
),
dados_trabalhados AS
(SELECT d.data,
d.PMM,
d.cn,
d.msc,
NVL(p.SMP5_A, 0) SMP5_A,
NVL(p.SMP5_B, 0) SMP5_B,
NVL(p.SMP5_C, 0) SMP5_C,
NVL(p.SMP5_D, 0) SMP5_D,
NVL(
(SELECT b.CODIGO
FROM
(SELECT *
FROM MSC_CN_CODIGO b
ORDER BY cnAtivo.MSC,
cnAtivo.CN,
ultima_atualizacao
) b
WHERE d.msc = b.MSC
AND d.cn = b.CN
AND TRUNC(d.data, 'MM') >= TRUNC(b.ultima_atualizacao, 'MM')
AND ROWNUM = 1
), 'NID') AS codigo
FROM distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm d,
dados_x_codigos p,
VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP5 cnAtivo
WHERE d.msc = p.msc(+)
AND d.cn = p.CN(+)
AND d.PMM = p.PMM(+)
AND TRUNC(d.data) = TRUNC(p.DATA(+))
AND cnAtivo.MSC = d.msc
AND cnAtivo.CN = d.cn
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(cnAtivo.PERIODO, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = to_date(TO_CHAR(d.data, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy')
AND cnAtivo.STATUS = 'T'
),
dados_smp5 AS
(SELECT *
FROM
(SELECT 'SMP5' AS SMP,
TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy') AS DDX,
NULL AS CONSOLIDACAO,
DECODE(c.codigo, NULL, 'NID', c.codigo) AS PRIMARIA,
DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '026', '056') AS PONDERACAO,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_B, 0) + NVL(SMP5_D, 0))), '-') AS val_ponderacao,
DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '01', '02') AS COLETA,
'' AS indice_14,
'' AS val_indice_14,
'' AS indice_15,
'' AS val_indice_15,
'' AS indice_17,
'' AS val_indice_17,
'' AS indice_18,
'' AS val_indice_18,
'' AS indice_19,
'' AS val_indice_19,
'' AS indice_20,
'' AS val_indice_20,
'22' AS indice_22,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_A, 0))), '-') AS val_indice_22,
'23' AS indice_23,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_B, 0))), '-') AS val_indice_23,
'24' AS indice_24,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_C, 0))), '-') AS val_indice_24,
'25' AS indice_25,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_D, 0))), '-') AS val_indice_25,
'' AS indice_27,
'' AS val_indice_27,
'' AS indice_28,
'' AS val_indice_28,
'' AS indice_30,
'' AS val_indice_30,
'' AS indice_31,
'' AS val_indice_31,
'' AS indice_33,
'' AS val_indice_33,
'' AS indice_34,
'' AS val_indice_34,
'' AS indice_36,
'' AS val_indice_36,
'' AS indice_37,
'' AS val_indice_37
FROM dados_trabalhados c,
ddx ddx,
PMM pmm
WHERE TO_CHAR(c.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy')
AND c.PMM = pmm.NOME
GROUP BY 'SMP5',
TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy'),
NULL,
'22',
'23',
'24',
'25',
c.codigo,
pmm.NOME
ORDER BY PRIMARIA
)
WHERE PRIMARIA != 'NID'
)
SELECT dados_smp5.SMP,
dados_smp5.DDX,
dados_smp5.CONSOLIDACAO,
dados_smp5.PRIMARIA,
dados_smp5.PONDERACAO,
dados_smp5.val_ponderacao,
dados_smp5.COLETA,
dados_smp5.indice_14,
dados_smp5.val_indice_14,
dados_smp5.indice_15,
dados_smp5.val_indice_15,
dados_smp5.indice_17,
dados_smp5.val_indice_17,
dados_smp5.indice_18,
dados_smp5.val_indice_18,
dados_smp5.indice_19,
dados_smp5.val_indice_19,
dados_smp5.indice_20,
dados_smp5.val_indice_20,
dados_smp5.indice_22,
dados_smp5.val_indice_22,
dados_smp5.indice_23,
dados_smp5.val_indice_23,
dados_smp5.indice_24,
dados_smp5.val_indice_24,
dados_smp5.indice_25,
dados_smp5.val_indice_25,
dados_smp5.indice_27,
dados_smp5.val_indice_27,
dados_smp5.indice_28,
dados_smp5.val_indice_28,
dados_smp5.indice_30,
dados_smp5.val_indice_30,
dados_smp5.indice_31,
dados_smp5.val_indice_31,
dados_smp5.indice_33,
dados_smp5.val_indice_33,
dados_smp5.indice_34,
dados_smp5.val_indice_34,
dados_smp5.indice_36,
dados_smp5.val_indice_36,
dados_smp5.indice_37,
dados_smp5.val_indice_37
FROM dados_smp5
TableView.layoutSQL: With dados_x_codigos As (Select c.DATA, c.BILHETADOR_ORIGINAL, c.CENTRAL As msc, c.CN, c.PMM, c.REGIONAL, c.SMP5_A, c.SMP5_B, c.SMP5_C, c.SMP5_D, c.UF, c.CODIGO From VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5 c, VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP5 v Where v.CN = c.CN And v.MSC = c.CENTRAL And to_date(TO_CHAR(c.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = v.PERIODO And v.STATUS = 'T'), codigos_sem_dados As (Select Distinct codigo.MSC, codigo.CN From MSC_CN_CODIGO codigo, (Select Distinct BILHETADOR.nome From indicador, TIPO_TECNOLOGIA, TECNOLOGIA, BILHETADOR Where TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = indicador.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA And TIPO_TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA = TECNOLOGIA.ID_TIPO_TECNOLOGIA And TECNOLOGIA.ID = BILHETADOR.ID_TECNOLOGIA And indicador.nome In ('SMP3', 'SMP4', 'SMP5', 'SMP7')) bilhetador Where codigo.MSC = bilhetador.nome Minus Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.msc, TO_CHAR(dados_x_codigos.CN) From dados_x_codigos), distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm As (Select * From (Select Distinct TRUNC(dados_x_codigos.DATA) As data From dados_x_codigos) datas, (Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.msc, TO_CHAR(dados_x_codigos.CN) cn From dados_x_codigos) msc, (Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.PMM From dados_x_codigos) pmm Union All Select * From (Select Distinct data, MSC, TO_CHAR(CN) cn From (Select Distinct data, codigos_sem_dados.MSC, codigos_sem_dados.CN From codigos_sem_dados, (Select Distinct TRUNC(dados_x_codigos.DATA) As data From dados_x_codigos))) msc, (Select Distinct dados_x_codigos.PMM From dados_x_codigos) pmm), dados_trabalhados As (Select d.data, d.PMM, d.cn, d.msc, NVL(p.SMP5_A, 0) SMP5_A, NVL(p.SMP5_B, 0) SMP5_B, NVL(p.SMP5_C, 0) SMP5_C, NVL(p.SMP5_D, 0) SMP5_D, NVL((Select b.CODIGO From (Select * From MSC_CN_CODIGO b Order By cnAtivo.MSC, cnAtivo.CN, ultima_atualizacao) b Where d.msc = b.MSC And d.cn = b.CN And TRUNC(d.data, 'MM') >= TRUNC(b.ultima_atualizacao, 'MM') And RowNum = 1), 'NID') As codigo From distinct_msc_cn_x_pmm d, dados_x_codigos p, VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP5 cnAtivo Where d.msc = p.msc(+) And d.cn = p.CN(+) And d.PMM = p.PMM(+) And TRUNC(d.data) = TRUNC(p.DATA(+)) And cnAtivo.MSC = d.msc And cnAtivo.CN = d.cn And to_date(TO_CHAR(cnAtivo.PERIODO, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = to_date(TO_CHAR(d.data, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') And cnAtivo.STATUS = 'T'), dados_smp5 As (Select * From (Select 'SMP5' As SMP, TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy') As DDX, Null As CONSOLIDACAO, DECODE(c.codigo, Null, 'NID', c.codigo) As PRIMARIA, DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '026', '056') As PONDERACAO, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP5_B, 0) + NVL(SMP5_D, 0))), '-') As val_ponderacao, DECODE(pmm.NOME, 'PMM1', '01', '02') As COLETA, '' As indice_14, '' As val_indice_14, '' As indice_15, '' As val_indice_15, '' As indice_17, '' As val_indice_17, '' As indice_18, '' As val_indice_18, '' As indice_19, '' As val_indice_19, '' As indice_20, '' As val_indice_20, '22' As indice_22, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP5_A, 0))), '-') As val_indice_22, '23' As indice_23, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP5_B, 0))), '-') As val_indice_23, '24' As indice_24, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP5_C, 0))), '-') As val_indice_24, '25' As indice_25, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(SMP5_D, 0))), '-') As val_indice_25, '' As indice_27, '' As val_indice_27, '' As indice_28, '' As val_indice_28, '' As indice_30, '' As val_indice_30, '' As indice_31, '' As val_indice_31, '' As indice_33, '' As val_indice_33, '' As indice_34, '' As val_indice_34, '' As indice_36, '' As val_indice_36, '' As indice_37, '' As val_indice_37 From dados_trabalhados c, ddx ddx, PMM pmm Where TO_CHAR(c.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') = TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') And c.PMM = pmm.NOME Group By 'SMP5', TO_CHAR(ddx.data, 'MM/yyyy'), Null, '22', '23', '24', '25', c.codigo, pmm.NOME Order By PRIMARIA) Where PRIMARIA != 'NID') Select dados_smp5.SMP, dados_smp5.DDX, dados_smp5.CONSOLIDACAO, dados_smp5.PRIMARIA, dados_smp5.PONDERACAO, dados_smp5.val_ponderacao, dados_smp5.COLETA, dados_smp5.indice_14, dados_smp5.val_indice_14, dados_smp5.indice_15, dados_smp5.val_indice_15, dados_smp5.indice_17, dados_smp5.val_indice_17, dados_smp5.indice_18, dados_smp5.val_indice_18, dados_smp5.indice_19, dados_smp5.val_indice_19, dados_smp5.indice_20, dados_smp5.val_indice_20, dados_smp5.indice_22, dados_smp5.val_indice_22, dados_smp5.indice_23, dados_smp5.val_indice_23, dados_smp5.indice_24, dados_smp5.val_indice_24, dados_smp5.indice_25, dados_smp5.val_indice_25, dados_smp5.indice_27, dados_smp5.val_indice_27, dados_smp5.indice_28, dados_smp5.val_indice_28, dados_smp5.indice_30, dados_smp5.val_indice_30, dados_smp5.indice_31, dados_smp5.val_indice_31, dados_smp5.indice_33, dados_smp5.val_indice_33, dados_smp5.indice_34, dados_smp5.val_indice_34, dados_smp5.indice_36, dados_smp5.val_indice_36, dados_smp5.indice_37, dados_smp5.val_indice_37 From dados_smp5
